data.comment: Andy Davies starts the match. Middlesbrough with the kick-off in Middlesbrough.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, It's Luton with the kick-off after the break.
Goal! Chuba Akpom gives Middlesbrough a 1-0 lead.
The away team replace Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall with Ryan Tunnicliffe.
In the minute 62, Luke Berry is replacing Rhys Norrington-Davies for the away team.
Penalty! Andy Davies points to the spot, great chance for Luton...
Sam Morsy (Middlesbrough) has been shown a straight red card by referee Andy Davies.
In the minute 70, Neil Warnock (Middlesbrough) is making a first substitution, with Lewis Wing replacing Duncan Watmore.
Glen Rea (Luton) has received a yellow card from Andy Davies.
Luton make their third substitution with George Moncur replacing Harry Cornick.
In the minute 78, Britt Assombalonga is on a sub for Chuba Akpom for Middlesbrough.
The home team have replaced Marvin Johnson with Djed Spence. This is the third substitution made today by Neil Warnock.
Jordan Clark is replacing Glen Rea for Luton at Riverside.
In the minute 87, Nathan Jones is making the team's fifth substitution at Riverside with Danny Hylton replacing Ruddock Pelly.
Andy Davies blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
Britt Assombalonga (Middlesbrough) gets a yellow card.
